casebody.data:
Frederick CORNELIUS
v.
Linda ARNOLD, Tax Assessor, Town of Farmington Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 11, 2017

Frederick Cornelius, self-represented, in support of the petition.

Duncan J. Forsyth, in opposition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn. App. 703, 147 A.3d 729 (2016), is denied.
